name: 6StarMedia.com
overview:
6StarMedia.com is a website design and marketing firm that works with businesses, corporations, hobbyists and professionals to increase their online exposure.

Our North American operations are headquartered in Ontario, Canada and managed by Kevin Perry. Kevin has been has been an internet entrepreneur for the last 10 years and specializes in website design and business strategy. Aside from managing the day to day operations from the North American perspective, Kevin also oversees all 6StarMedia website designs as well as marketing plans.

Our European and Oceania operations are headquartered in New South Wales, Australia and managed by Maggie David. Maggie is a published author of several internet marketing and health related books, a master of organization, as well as having the distinction of running her own Spa business. Maggie knows exactly what it takes to succeed in business and shares that knowledge with each of our clients. Aside from her European and Oceania duties, Maggie is also the head of our writing division and oversees all content before delivered to our clients.

As you can clearly see by our eclectic talents and services offered, 6StarMedia is your full service choice for turning your business and/or website into an online authority. We’re involved in all aspects of the process and also make sure our clients feel like they are a part of the process as well. We strive to produce a perfect solution and we are not satisfied until you are!
